eeth une hithagannath bari deyak..mage?(uge)kumari kaduwa dunne mata.matama therune naha mokada wenne kiyala..meka neweyine siddawenna thibune.mama kaduwa illa illa thamayi hitiye.uduragannath wage haduwa kiyala mathakayi.eeth mata kaduwa labunoth mokakda kala yuththe kiyala mama danagena hitiye naha.hithapu nathi dewal weddi kohomatath kalabalayi..mama eka paratama kaduwa aragena panapu gaman aruta anagena anagena giya..sathutakda kenthiyakda mokakda manda mata ee welawe aawe..

kohathgen pawathennan+ atharin ashariyage puth yowel saha amasayige puth mahathda merarigen pawathennan+ atharin abdige puth kish saha yehallelelge puth ashariyada gershongen pawathennan+ atharin simmage puth yowa saha yowage puth eedanda 13 elishafangen pawathennan+ atharin shimri saha yewuyelda aasafgen pawathennan+ atharin sekariya saha maththaniyada 14 hemangen pawathennan+ atharin yehiyel saha shimeyida yeduthungen pawathennan+ atharin shemaya saha ussiyelda yana ayaya. 15 sesu lewiwarunwada ras karagath owuhu mulinma pawithra wi,+ raju ana kala lesa+ yehowa dewige gruhaya pawithra kirimata piyawara gaththoya.+ owuhu eya kale yehowa dewi pawasa thibu aakarayataya. 16 yehowa dewige gruhaya pawithra kirima sandaha eyata athul wu pujakayo yehowa dewige gruhaye thibu siyaluma apawithra dewal yehowa dewige gruhaye maluwata genawoya.+ inpasu lewiwaru maluwen pitathata ee apawithra dewal ragena gos kidron nimnayata wisi kaloya.+ 17 owun mema pawithra kirime karyaya aarambha kale palamu masaye mulma dawasediya.
